short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Asks chatGPT to choose the best answer from presented

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Stackoverflow Helper extension empowers you to find the best answer on Stack Overflow quickly and effortlessly. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and confusion – make informed decisions in seconds!

Key Features:

Streamlined Answer Evaluation: Easily compare and evaluate multiple answers to find the most accurate and helpful solution. Save time and make confident decisions with ease.

Side-by-Side Comparison: View answers side by side in a clean and intuitive interface. Quickly assess code snippets, explanations, and community feedback for each answer, all in one place.

Highlight Prominent Solutions: Highlight highly-rated answers, verified solutions, or answers from trusted experts. Customize the criteria based on your preferences to ensure you get the most reliable information.



Enhance your productivity, make better-informed decisions, and get the best solutions faster with the Stackoverflow Helper extension. Don't waste time digging through pages of answers – choose the best answer effortlessly!
